title: Tempted
description: I'm heartless and cutthroat. It's just the way I was raised.I had no regrets. Until she showed up.It started with her old man. That stubborn bastard set me up. He knew what he was doing. I fell for her before I even heard her voice.What was he thinking, trying to set her up with a prick like me?She's too good for me. I should've walked away. But every time she told me no, it only made me want to chase her more.And now I'm f*cked. She's f*cked.I'm trouble, that's all I am, and I brought that to her doorstep.She's gonna hate me. But she's not leaving.She tempted me; now she's mine.*Tempted is a full-length standalone romance with an HEA, no cheating, and no cliffhanger. Contains TWO featured books Blitzed and Bad Girl for your continued reading pleasure!
author: Lauren Landish
